definition: variant of 慪氣|怄气[ou4 qi4]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: All his days also he eateth in darkness, and he hath much sorrow and wrath with his sickness.
sentences.chinese: 并且他终身在黑暗中吃喝，多有烦恼，又有病患呕气。

definition: to be difficult with sb/to provoke disagreement/at loggerheads/to fall out with
to act in a fit of pique/to get in a huff/to be peeved
to annoy/to irritate/to be annoyed/to sulk
to seethe/to sulk/to be pissed off (vulgar)
to lower oneself to sb's level/to argue with sb less well-informed
to bicker/to argue for the sake of arguing/to carry on poles (together with sb else)/to carry a coffin on poles
to quarrel/to have a row/quarrel/CL:頓|顿[dun4]
to quarrel/to make a noise/noisy/to disturb by making a noise
erhua variant of 較勁|较劲[jiao4 jin4]
